title: Licences of restaurants, clubs serving liquor could be cancelled if functional CCTV cameras not installed: Delhi excise dept
description: In order to check violations at the hotels, clubs and restaurants, the inspection teams rely on the CCTV footage obtained from their premises. However, often the teams are not provided with the CCTV footage by the licensees on the pretext that the cameras are non-functional, a senior officer of the department said.
